name: The TarantuLad: The Urban Legend
description:
You are the urban legend. 

Explore the city as The TarantuLAD! 

Rumor has it - the mysterious figure emerges from the shadows and swings from rooftops to rooftops.

Hint: Swing Timing Matters!

Team

Carlos Daniel De Oliveira Serapio 

  • System programmer: Develop the map system that procedural generate the level. Every section and every run is different! You will never run out of the horizontal game space. :D
  • Concept & 2D Artist: Created the visual concept of the game as well as final player character & environment art. 

Ting Wen

  • Gameplay programmer: Developed the jumping & swinging mechanics. If it doesn't feel good to play, it's on her. 
  • Game Designer: Designed the game and decided how it looks. 

Gurveer Singh Suri

  • Artist: Gathered visual resources during development. 

Controls:

Keyboard -

  • Movement: WASD, Arrow Keys.
  • Jump: Space
  • Swing: Double tap Space when seeing the hooks. (The direction of your swing is opposite to whether you are on the left or right of the hook. Try it! You'll figure it out :D )

xBox & PS Controller - 

  • Movement: Left Stick
  • Jump & Swing: Double tap A/X
